rows.label: tlk70000018_04_msg0001
rows.name:
So! I heard you're heading
off to face the Holy Grail.

rows.label: tlk70000018_04_msg0002
rows.name:
It'll be tough to leave my shop
behind, but at least we've got
the shelter you helped us build.

rows.label: tlk70000018_04_msg0003
rows.name:
With an opponent like the Holy
Grail... Well, all I can do is wish
you luck. For your sake and ours.

rows.label: tlk70000018_04_msg0005
rows.name:
Well, try and protect this city,
OK? My wife and I love it here.
We don't want to lose our home.
